title: Mom gets pranked by her son and starts to think her home is HAUNTED
text:
One cheeky son in Cleveland, Ohio, gave his mother quite the scare by pranking her in her own kitchen.

Video shows the son named Will hiding next to a counter while his mother puts a water bottle in the refrigerator.

When the mother turns her back to put the bottle away, the son replaces it with another water bottle.

A cheeky son filmed himself pranking his unsuspecting mother

Video shows the unidentified son hiding next to a counter while his mother puts a water bottle in the refrigerator

When she turns her back to put the bottle away, the son replaces it with another

The mother can be seen looking stunned and confused as a water bottle 'magically' appears on the counter after putting it away.

According to her son, his mother thought that ghosts were trying to haunt her.

The son can be seen with his hands over his mouth trying to hold in his laughter as he carries out the prank.

Clearly confused, she can be heard saying 'What?!' when she turns around and finds another plastic water bottle.
description: Video shows the son named Will hiding next to a counter while his mother puts a water bottle in the refrigerator. When she turns her back to put the bottle away, the son replaces it with another.
